snippet.title: Leftover Turkey Crescent Bake recipe
snippet.description:
Leftover Turkey Crescent Bake
Source: Pillsbury® Crescents
This easy casserole is so delicious, you'll want turkey 'n all the trimmings just for the leftovers!
